WP Perk Support

8 Mar 2021, 13:40 GMT+11

Thanks great news Jenn,

At least they have received them. If they are still having trouble getting the emails to their inbox, we can setup a custom SMTP account, which can help, but requires for them to setup a dedicated email account. Some clients aren't so keen on this as it can add extra expense etc.

Let me know if you need anymore help at this stage.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
support@wpperk.com


Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!

WP Perk Support

8 Mar 2021, 12:46 GMT+11

Hi Jenn,

I have looked into this further and run some tests. The emails are definitely sending, please see attached copy of the clients submission, which I sent to my own email address as a test.

I suspect the emails may be getting stuck in their junk folder, so I have updated some settings which can sometimes help in this case. Can you please check with the client if they have had a look in their junk/spam folder?

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
support@wpperk.com
